author: Manmohan Singh
description: “In 1919, the 19th Amendment gave women the ‘right to vote’ in America. My signature cocktail is for all those ladies out there – many of whom may not prefer rum based cocktails. I want my drink to change their perception and cast their vote in favour of BACARDÍ - the king of all rums.”
name: Nineteenth
recipeIngredient: 20 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
